replies.body: Were you able to report them if that happened in-game or during post game? Hitting that button can tie the chat logs to the report so we have some data to back us up.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=18EwpYm1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-13T02:02:35.060+0000)
>
> Were you able to report them if that happened in-game or during post game? Hitting that button can tie the chat logs to the report so we have some data to back us up.

Yes i did report them.  So did KillaFrost91. I really hope something gets done, cause that was just out of control.
Well I was in the game with the person who made this thread and he pretty much said all of this. It's sad that he would stoop to this level but hey that is life.
